full_output.summary: Highly organized and detail-oriented accounting professional with demonstrated expertise in accounts payable (AP), accounts receivable (AR), general bookkeeping, and financial analysis. Proven ability to accurately process high transaction volumes, resolve vendor and client issues, and maintain impeccable financial records. Possess strong Oracle and Excel skills.

experiences.description: Proficient in Excel for data analysis and reporting, ensuring accurate insights for decision-making. Successfully resolve accounts payable and receivable issues, ensuring smooth financial operations. Coordinate with internal and external stakeholders to facilitate seamless audit processes. Ensure accuracy and compliance with Generally Accepted Accounting Principles (GAAP) in financial statements. Assist in financial and tax audits, contributing to timely and accurate financial reporting. Contribute to the development of client treatment protocols and acquisition plans through financial analysis and reporting.

experiences.company_name: Samuchit Consultancy Service India Pvt Ltd
experiences.description: Managed end-to-end AP and AR processes, including preparing vouchers, processing invoices (PO and non-PO), conducting two-way and three-way matching, and resolving vendor discrepancies. Prepared and maintained accurate bank reconciliation statements. Processed an average of 2,300-2,500 invoices per month, ensuring timely payment and addressing vendor inquiries promptly. Conducted invoice audits and resolved issues related to late payments. Handled vendor and client queries effectively via phone, email, and ticketing systems. Recorded daily transactions, finalized bookkeeping, and maintained required registers. Assisted for preparing both Inward & Outward GST reports. Uploaded and scanned invoices into the company portal.

Managed receipts and records for business transactions. Prepared financial reports and balance sheets. Monitored transactions and identified irregularities in invoices. Ensured accuracy in bank deposits and payments.

full_output.name: JOHN DASS
achievements_and_awards: Distinguished member of universitys Accounting Society
